description.p: The T-shirt shows the Fellowship logo and the text "Hacking for Freedom" on the front and the text "fellowship of fsfe" on the back.
The shirt shows the Fellowship logo and the text "Hacking for Freedom" on the front and the text "fellowship of fsfe" on the back.
Many Fellows use this lanyard keychain to carry their Fellowship smart card around their neck.
A pin with the Fellowship logo.
